abstract: Oracle’s deal machine has come to life once more, as the enterprise software giant agreed on Monday to buy Acme Packet for $2.1 billion to bolster its communications product offerings.
snippet: Oracle’s deal machine has come to life once more, as the enterprise software giant agreed on Monday to buy Acme Packet for $2.1 billion to bolster its communications product offerings.
lead_paragraph: Oracle‘s deal machine has come to life once more, as the enterprise software giant agreed on Monday to buy Acme Packet for $2.1 billion to bolster its communications product offerings.

headline.main: Oracle to Buy Acme Packet for $2.1 Billion

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
